description: Add simple notes to the notification area. Click on tray icon, it will show up a dialog where you can input your notification title, message and optionally icon(default will be same as the extension icon). Important: Do not put any information that you would care if lost. Due to limitation on GNOME 45 & 46, only the 3 most recent notifications are shown for every app however this is not the case for older GNOME Versions, you can add as many pins as you like.
name: Pin It
